trans-unit.source: Whenever a Minotaur attacks this turn, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Destroy that creature at end of combat.

trans-unit.source: Altar of Mogis
trans-unit.target: Altar of Mogis

trans-unit.resname: TBTH·11 | Altar of Mogis | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward — When Altar of Mogis is put into a graveyard from anywhere, the Horde sacrifices two Minotaurs.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward — When Altar of Mogis is put into a graveyard from anywhere, the Horde sacrifices two Minotaurs.

trans-unit.source: Massacre Totem
trans-unit.target: Massacre Totem

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward — When Massacre Totem is put into a graveyard from anywhere, put the top seven cards of the Horde's library into its graveyard.
trans-unit.target: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward — When Massacre Totem is put into a graveyard from anywhere, put the top seven cards of the Horde's library into its graveyard.

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward — When Refreshing Elixir is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each player gains 5 life.

trans-unit.source: Vitality Salve
trans-unit.target: Vitality Salve

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of the Horde's precombat main phase, reveal an additional card from the top of the Horde's library. The Horde casts that card. Hero's Reward — When Vitality Salve is put into a graveyard from anywhere, each player returns a creature card from their graveyard to the battlefield.
